Reviews.Title: “Clean and well-maintained hotel in ideal location”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: perfect location blue mosque topkapi palace aya sophia outside metro close step outside door enjoy istanbul time hotel quiet hotel beautiful kept clean maintained meticulously trace dirt mirrors glass surfaces hotel offers organic milk breakfast restaurant serves organic meat service friendly helpful note larger depicted photos cheapest internet times slow hotel hope fixed

Reviews.Title: “The Hotel Of Your Dreams!!!”
Reviews.Author: Melissa D
Reviews.Content: hotel seen magical fairytale soon walk greeted huge white marble surrounding concierge warm smiles welcoming staff ready eager serve whatever desire clean tastefully decorated restaurant downstairs served delicious food exquisite service overall stay pleasure cant wait

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Sid B
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel tour package true blue tours hotel service staffs speak limited english remember pack toothbrush hotel provide makes hotel stands location close local shops restaurants cafes major historical sites sultanahment definitely recommend trying hotel youre planning stay sultanahmet istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Small upscale boutique hotel in great location with friendly staff”

Reviews.Content: design hotel sweet upscale boutique hotel location istanbuls amazing attractions lavishly decorated balcony looking blue mosque site night staff eager please queen front desk helpful suggested restaurants called taxi help historic hammam connected restaurant cafe walking distance topkapi palace hagia sophia blue mosque etc middle restaurants officially roof terrace hadnt fabulous view crowded sultanahment hotel garden cafe exposed outdoors design touch overthetop stylish creative

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, well located very poor service”
Reviews.Author: Jojo42660
Reviews.Content: 28 running istanbul marathon staying 4 days hotel brand pretty luxurious little bit ostentatious missing curtains real issue service reception unless disappointed service people speaking english dont care comfort hosts told yourself hope starting warm
